name: clinical-fire
description: Fast Interoperable Rules Engine for healthcare workflows

scripts.build: npm run build:shared && npm run build:core && npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspace=@clinical-fire/shared && npm run lint --workspace=@clinical-fire/core && npm run lint --workspace=@clinical-fire/api && npm run lint --workspace=@clinical-fire/web
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspace=@clinical-fire/shared && npm run clean --workspace=@clinical-fire/core && npm run clean --workspace=@clinical-fire/api
scripts.type-check: npm run type-check --workspace=@clinical-fire/shared && npm run type-check --workspace=@clinical-fire/core && npm run type-check --workspace=@clinical-fire/api && npm run type-check --workspace=@clinical-fire/web
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=@clinical-fire/shared && npm install --workspace=@clinical-fire/core && npm install --workspace=@clinical-fire/api && npm install --workspace=@clinical-fire/web
